metadataAttributes.Title: Experimental Design & Recommendations
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Learn two of the most in-demand skills in the entire field of data science! By the end of this course, you’ll know how to generate personalized recommendations based on user data, as well as run statistically valid tests that produce clean, interpretable results.
metadataAttributes.Skills: SMART Experiments, Interpreting Test Results, Experiment Control, Experiment Metrics, Experiment Design, Bias Detection, Recommendation Engine Fluency, Recommendation Engines, Recommendation Engine Business Context, AI Algorithms in Python, Latent Variables, Matrix Factorization
